short_summary: Construction of a new concrete loading dock, stairs, and guardrail at Stony Mountain Institution
description: Work involves demolishing existing slab and foundation walls down to existing footing and constructing a new concrete loading dock, stairs, and associated foundations plus a new guardrail. Then provide new site grading and asphalt paving.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Project Title:** Phase 1 ITQ - ET025-230663 C17 - East Loading Dock Design and Repair

**Reference Number:** WS3591753903-Doc3620692734

**Publication Date:** August 12, 2022

**Tender Submission Deadline:** August 29, 2022, at 2:00 PM MDT

**Project Description:**
This project involves the design and construction of a new east loading dock at Stony Mountain Institution, Stony Mountain, Manitoba. The work includes:

* Demolishing the existing slab and foundation walls down to the existing footing
* Constructing a new concrete loading dock, stairs, and associated foundations
* Installing a new guardrail
* Providing new site grading and asphalt paving

The contract duration is projected to be 16 weeks. This tender announcement is the first phase of a two-phase solicitation process. The first phase evaluates the qualifications of interested suppliers. Suppliers with suitable qualifications will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project in the second phase.

**Important Notes:**

* The original closing time has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 29, 2022, at 2:00 PM MDT.
* Bids submitted after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

**Contractor Requirements:**
The selected contractor must have experience in infrastructure construction and surfacing and paving services. They must provide a detailed project schedule and ensure that the work is completed within the specified timeframe.

**Eligibility:**
This tender is open to all suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the tender document.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided. All inquiries and submission requirements should be directed to Matthew Virakorn at matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**
None.
